footnotes.text: 1In Abraham Lincolnâ€™s hand, except the signature.

2The letter toBohannonhas not been located.  The money referenced probably represented at least a partial
                  collection of the notes againstAllen & StoneandJosiah Francis. Thomas Bohannan & Co. had hired Stuart & Lincoln to collect debts from Allen & Stone
                  and Francis, debtors of Bohannan & Co.John T. Stuart and Abraham Lincoln to Thomas Bohannon;Stuart & Lincoln collected debt for Thomas Bohannan & Co., Martha L.
